## createSdfTextMaterial() function

Helper function designed to create \[\[SdfTextMaterials\]\] that can be rendered using \[\[TextCanvas\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createSdfTextMaterial(params: SdfTextMaterialParameters): SdfTextMaterial;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | [SdfTextMaterialParameters](./harp-text-canvas.sdftextmaterialparameters.md) | Material parameters. |
